channel.title: Need help (overloadX Source)
channel.description:
hello,
i downloaded a few days ago the overloadx source and i wanted to code it but i am a beginning coder so there are some things i can't code and need help for it. hope u guys can help me.
Problem 1. there are items that are named overloadx pickaxe and overloadx axe and overloadx donator cape. i already did go to item and i changed that name there but ingame u see still overloadx axe overloadx pickaxe and overloadx donator cape. DONE :D
Problem 2. i got 1 teleport but i want to change the teleport places. [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/14/px6.png/][IMG=http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/1935/px6.png]http://[/img][/URL] i want to change that teleports to onther palces like duel arena varrock pk and onther places in wild etc. hope u guys can help me with this.
Problem 3. i wanted to make a ::home command that teles u to home but if i place it in i got 100 errors or something can u guys help me with that. got a error [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/829/u3sg.png/][IMG=http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/5473/u3sg.png][/IMG][/URL]
problem 4. i got packages like skiller combat costum pker and misc packages but they only give bad stuff. can somebody tel me how i can change the rewards of that packages.
Problem 5. the ::setlevel command is for only owner i want to make it for everybody. i tryed everything but it gives errors. now i don't have errors but its only for owner can somebody help me with that. atm i got this in the files.
} if (playerCommand.startsWith("setlevel")) { if (c.inWild()) return; for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) { if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) { c.sendMessage("Please remove all your equipment before using this command."); return; }
hope u guys really can help me. i don't know much about coding because i code like 2 months now but i don't know so much about coding so i am a beginner.

item.title: Need help (overloadX Source)
item.dc:creator: @topless topless
item.description:
@topless wrote:

[quote=“Pk6uhave2, post:14, topic:527742”]Then it should be PI based.

For your Master code, try this:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { for (int i = 0; i < 25; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); } c.getPA().requestUpdates(); }

Pure, try this:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("pure")) { if (c.inWild()) return; c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(60)+5; c.playerLevel[0] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(0); c.playerXP[2] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(70)+5; c.playerLevel[2] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(2); c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(70)+5; c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); c.playerXP[4] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(70)+5; c.playerLevel[4] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(4); c.playerXP[6] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(55)+5; c.playerLevel[6] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(6); }[/quote]

got 1 error now

Read full topic

item.title: Need help (overloadX Source)
item.dc:creator: @topless topless
item.description:
@topless wrote:

got 1 problem more the codes works only ::home doesn’t work for normal players and normal players can’t do ::setlevel ::Pure or ::master

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("master") && c.playerRights > 0) {
				if (c.inWild())
				return;
			for (int j = 0; j < 7; j++) {
				if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("runeball")) {
					c.getItems().addItem(0, 0);
					c.pkPoints = 0;
				}
			c.playerXP[j] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5;
			c.playerLevel[j] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[j]);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(j);
			}

this is master code

		}
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("setlevel") && c.playerRights > 0) {
			if (c.inWild())
				return;
			for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) {
				if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) {
					c.sendMessage("Please remove all your equipment before using this command.");
					return;
				}
			}
			try {
			String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
			int skill = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
			int level = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
			if (level > 99)
				level = 99;
			else if (level < 0)
				level = 1;
			c.playerXP[skill] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(level)+5;
			c.playerLevel[skill] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(skill);
			} catch (Exception e){}
		}

This is the Setlevel code

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("pure") && c.playerRights > 0) {
				if (c.inWild())
				return;
			c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5;
			c.playerLevel[0] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(0);
			c.playerXP[2] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5;
			c.playerLevel[2] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(2);
			c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5;
			c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
			c.playerXP[4] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5;
			c.playerLevel[4] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(4);
			c.playerXP[6] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5;
			c.playerLevel[6] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(6);	
		}

and this is the ::pure code i got no errors but it works only for owner and playerright is 0?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help (overloadX Source)
item.dc:creator: @topless topless
item.description:
@topless wrote:

[quote=“Pk6uhave2, post:4, topic:527742”][quote author=topless link=topic=646493.msg4347672#msg4347672 date=1376143135]
hello,

i downloaded a few days ago the overloadx source and i wanted to code it but i am a beginning coder so there are some things i can’t code and need help for it.
hope u guys can help me.

Problem 1.
there are items that are named overloadx pickaxe and overloadx axe and overloadx donator cape.
i already did go to item and i changed that name there but ingame u see still overloadx axe overloadx pickaxe and overloadx donator cape.
can somebody help me

Problem 2.
i got 2 teleports but i want to change the teleport places.

i want to change that teleports to onther palces like duel arena varrock pk and onther places in wild etc.
hope u guys can help me with this.

Problem 3.
i wanted to make a ::home command that teles u to home but if i place it in i got 100 errors or something can u guys help me with that.

problem 4.
i got packages like skiller combat costum pker and misc packages but they only give bad stuff.
can somebody tel me how i can change the rewards of that packages.

Problem 5.
the ::setlevel command is for only owner i want to make it for everybody.
i tryed everything but it gives errors.
now i don’t have errors but its only for owner can somebody help me with that.
atm i got this in the files.

		}
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("setlevel")) {
			if (c.inWild())
				return;
			for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) {
				if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) {
					c.sendMessage("Please remove all your equipment before using this command.");
					return;
				}

hope u guys really can help me.
i don’t know much about coding because i code like 2 months now but i don’t know so much about coding so i am a beginner.
[/quote]

  1. Look in your ItemDef/Class8 (Idk if your Delta or PI) and search for overloadX, then you will find itemDef.name just change it to what ever you’d like.

  2. You will need to add images the same size as the rest of the interface showing the places you would like to add (or else it will look messed up). The rest I would have to spoon feed you so you will not learn anything. But a hint is RSinterface.java

  3. Copy this:
    if (playerCommand.startsWith("Teleport name") && c.teleBlockLength == 0 { c.getPA().startTeleport(X-Coord, Y-Coord, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Message once teleported."); }
    Build on that code, for example you can add a message so if it is entered, it will display a different message than “Message once teleported.”

  4. Hint: PlayerAssistant.java

  5. Hint: && c.playerRights == 0

I am not giving away how to do everything, other wise you will not learn anything at all. Hope everything works out for you and your server. Btw, I have only been Java coding for 2 weeks now. Have fun! :)[/quote]

haha thank you for everything i founded it how to change names from overloadx to anonther thing and i look for the rest now atm thank you

i got a error now because i putted in home but now i got 1 error not 100 anymore

help me plz?

Read full topic
